quiz.question: verified _______
quiz.explanation: 经过验证的，经过验证的账户。Her social media verified account had a blue checkmark. 她的社交媒体经过验证的账户有蓝色标记。

quiz.question: unjustified _____
quiz.explanation: 不合理的，不合理的声明。The lawsuit was based on an unjustified claim. 这起诉讼基于不合理的声明。

quiz.question: pied _______
quiz.explanation: 斑驳的，斑驳的鹡鸰。The pied wagtail is a common British bird. 斑驳的鹡鸰是常见的英国鸟类。

quiz.question: serried _____
quiz.explanation: 密集的，密集的队列。The soldiers stood in serried ranks. 士兵们站成密集的队列。

quiz.question: packed _______
quiz.explanation: 拥挤的，拥挤的体育场。The packed stadium roared with excitement. 拥挤的体育场充满兴奋的欢呼。

quiz.question: henpecked _______
quiz.explanation: 怕老婆的，怕老婆的丈夫。The henpecked husband never made decisions alone. 怕老婆的丈夫从不独自做决定。

quiz.question: wicked ____
quiz.explanation: 邪恶的，邪恶的行为。The villain committed a wicked deed. 恶棍犯下了邪恶的行为。

quiz.question: landlocked _______
quiz.explanation: 内陆的，内陆的国家。Switzerland is a landlocked country with no coastline. 瑞士是没有海岸线的内陆的国家。

quiz.question: marked ___________
quiz.explanation: 显著的，显著的改进。There was a marked improvement in his grades. 他的成绩有显著的改进。

quiz.question: garbled _______
quiz.explanation: 混乱的，混乱的信息。The garbled message was impossible to understand. 混乱的信息无法理解。

quiz.question: unbridled _______
quiz.explanation: 不受约束的，不受约束的激情。His unbridled passion for music was evident. 他对音乐不受约束的激情是显而易见的。

quiz.question: brindled ____
quiz.explanation: 有斑纹的，有斑纹的皮毛。The dog had a distinctive brindled coat. 这只狗有独特的有斑纹的皮毛。

quiz.question: disheveled ____
quiz.explanation: 凌乱的，凌乱的头发。She woke up with disheveled hair. 她醒来时头发凌乱的头发。

quiz.question: muffled _____
quiz.explanation: 低沉的，低沉的声音。A muffled sound came from behind the door. 门后传来低沉的声音。

quiz.question: unspoiled ______
quiz.explanation: 未受破坏的，未受破坏的自然。The island had beautiful unspoiled nature. 该岛有美丽的未受破坏的自然。

quiz.question: unprincipled _____
quiz.explanation: 无原则的，无原则的恶棍。The unprincipled rogue would do anything for money. 无原则的恶棍会为钱做任何事。

quiz.question: dappled ________
quiz.explanation: 斑驳的，斑驳的阳光。Dappled sunlight filtered through the trees. 斑驳的阳光透过树木。

quiz.question: gnarled ____
quiz.explanation: 扭曲的，扭曲的树。The ancient gnarled tree stood in the park. 古老的扭曲的树矗立在公园里。

quiz.question: settled _____
quiz.explanation: 固定的，固定的习惯。Reading before bed became a settled habit. 睡前阅读成为固定的习惯。

quiz.question: inflamed ______
quiz.explanation: 发炎的，发炎的组织。The doctor treated the inflamed tissue. 医生治疗了发炎的组织。

quiz.question: mistimed ______
quiz.explanation: 不合时宜的，不合时宜的评论。His mistimed remark embarrassed everyone. 他不合时宜的评论让每个人都很尴尬。

quiz.question: well-groomed __________
quiz.explanation: 仪表整洁的，仪表整洁的外表。The executive maintained a well-groomed appearance. 这位高管保持着仪表整洁的外表。

quiz.question: ____ informed
quiz.explanation: 消息灵通的，消息灵通的。She was well informed about current events. 她对时事消息灵通的。

quiz.question: unenlightened ____
quiz.explanation: 愚昧的，愚昧的观点。His unenlightened view was outdated. 他愚昧的观点过时了。

quiz.question: wizened ____
quiz.explanation: 干瘪的，干瘪的脸。The old woman had a wizened face. 老妇人有一张干瘪的脸。

quiz.question: feigned _______
quiz.explanation: 假装的，假装的疾病。His feigned illness didn't fool the doctor. 他假装的疾病没有骗过医生。

quiz.question: unfeigned _______
quiz.explanation: 真诚的，真诚的喜悦。She expressed unfeigned delight at the news. 她对这个消息表达了真诚的喜悦。

quiz.question: resigned __________
quiz.explanation: 顺从的，顺从的接受。He showed resigned acceptance of his fate. 他表现出对命运的顺从的接受。

quiz.question: ingrained _____
quiz.explanation: 根深蒂固的，根深蒂固的习惯。Smoking was an ingrained habit he couldn't break. 吸烟是他无法打破的根深蒂固的习惯。

quiz.question: constrained _____
quiz.explanation: 勉强的，勉强的微笑。She gave a constrained smile at the bad joke. 她对这个糟糕的笑话露出勉强的微笑。

quiz.question: sustained ______
quiz.explanation: 持续的，持续的努力。Success requires sustained effort over time. 成功需要长期持续的努力。

quiz.question: ____ defined
quiz.explanation: 明确的，明确定义的。The project had well defined objectives. 该项目有明确定义的目标。

quiz.question: ___ tined ____
quiz.explanation: 叉齿的，两叉齿的叉子。The salad was served with a two tined fork. 沙拉配有两叉齿的叉子。

quiz.question: impassioned ____
quiz.explanation: 激昂的，激昂的恳求。The lawyer made an impassioned plea for mercy. 律师发表了激昂的恳求请求宽恕。

quiz.question: unimpassioned ________
quiz.explanation: 冷静的，冷静的分析。The scientist provided an unimpassioned analysis of the data. 科学家提供了数据的冷静的分析。

quiz.question: seasoned _______
quiz.explanation: 经验丰富的，经验丰富的老手。The seasoned veteran knew how to handle pressure. 经验丰富的老手知道如何应对压力。

quiz.question: biped ____
quiz.explanation: 两足动物的，两足动物的步态。Humans walk with a distinctive biped gait. 人类以独特的两足动物的步态行走。

quiz.question: damped ___________
quiz.explanation: 阻尼的，阻尼的振荡。The engineer designed a damped oscillation system. 工程师设计了阻尼的振荡系统。

quiz.question: untapped _________
quiz.explanation: 未开发的，未开发的潜力。The region has vast untapped potential. 该地区有巨大的未开发的潜力。

quiz.question: ____-______ quadruped
quiz.explanation: 四足动物，四条腿的四足动物。Dogs are four-legged quadruped mammals. 狗是四条腿的四足动物哺乳动物。

quiz.question: vinegared _____
quiz.explanation: 醋味的，醋味的味道。The salad had a vinegared taste. 沙拉有醋味的味道。

quiz.question: lowbred ______
quiz.explanation: 粗俗的，粗俗的家伙。The lowbred fellow lacked manners. 粗俗的家伙缺乏礼貌。

quiz.question: sacred ___
quiz.explanation: 神圣的，神圣的誓言。The monks took a sacred vow of silence. 僧侣们立下了神圣的誓言保持沉默。

quiz.question: kindred _______
quiz.explanation: 志同道合的，志同道合的灵魂。They were kindred spirits who shared the same values. 他们是志同道合的灵魂，有着相同的价值观。

quiz.question: checkered ____
quiz.explanation: 有污点的，有污点的过去。The politician had a checkered past. 这位政客有有污点的过去。

quiz.question: mannered _____
quiz.explanation: 矫揉造作的，矫揉造作的风格。The writer's mannered style was criticized. 这位作家矫揉造作的风格受到批评。

quiz.question: even-tempered ______
quiz.explanation: 性情平和的，性情平和的领导者。The even-tempered leader remained calm in crises. 性情平和的领导者在危机中保持冷静。

quiz.question: ____ flustered
quiz.explanation: 慌乱的，感到慌乱。The unexpected question made her feel flustered. 意外的问题让她感到慌乱。

quiz.question: shattered _____
quiz.explanation: 破碎的，破碎的玻璃。Shattered glass covered the floor. 破碎的玻璃覆盖了地板。

quiz.question: acquired _____
quiz.explanation: 后天养成的，后天养成的品味。Caviar is an acquired taste. 鱼子酱是后天养成的品味。

quiz.question: labored _________
quiz.explanation: 费力的，费力的呼吸。The patient had labored breathing. 患者有费力的呼吸。

quiz.question: enamored __
quiz.explanation: 迷恋的，迷恋。She was enamored of the handsome stranger. 她迷恋那个英俊的陌生人。

quiz.question: _____ restored
quiz.explanation: 修复的，完全修复的。The antique car was fully restored. 古董车被完全修复的。

quiz.question: untutored ___
quiz.explanation: 未受训练的，未受训练的耳朵。To the untutored ear, the music sounded similar. 对未受训练的耳朵来说，音乐听起来相似。

quiz.question: marred __________
quiz.explanation: 损坏的，损坏的声誉。The scandal marred reputation of the company. 丑闻损坏的声誉了公司的。

quiz.question: inured __ ____
quiz.explanation: 习惯于，习惯于痛苦。The boxer was inured to pain from years of training. 拳击手经过多年训练习惯于痛苦。

quiz.question: measured ________
quiz.explanation: 慎重的，慎重的回应。The diplomat gave a measured response. 外交官给出了慎重的回应。

quiz.question: assured _______
quiz.explanation: 确定的，确定的胜利。The team's assured victory seemed certain. 球队确定的胜利似乎是肯定的。

quiz.question: improvised ______
quiz.explanation: 即兴的，即兴的演讲。The mayor gave an impressive improvised speech. 市长发表了令人印象深刻的即兴的演讲。

quiz.question: ______ composed
quiz.explanation: 镇定的，保持镇定。She managed to remain composed during the interview. 她在面试期间设法保持镇定。

quiz.question: __ disposed
quiz.explanation: 有意向的，有此意向。If you are so disposed, please join us. 如果你有此意向，请加入我们。

quiz.question: depressed ______
quiz.explanation: 萧条的，萧条的市场。The depressed market showed no signs of recovery. 萧条的市场没有复苏的迹象。

quiz.question: repressed ______
quiz.explanation: 压抑的，压抑的记忆。The therapist helped unlock repressed memory. 治疗师帮助解锁压抑的记忆。

quiz.question: ______ impressed
quiz.explanation: 印象深刻的，深深印象深刻。I was deeply impressed by her presentation. 我对她的演讲深深印象深刻。

quiz.question: possessed __ ____
quiz.explanation: 被控制的，被恐惧控制。He was possessed by fear and couldn't move. 他被恐惧控制，无法移动。

quiz.question: star-crossed ______
quiz.explanation: 命运多舛的，命运多舛的恋人。Romeo and Juliet were star-crossed lovers. 罗密欧和朱丽叶是命运多舛的恋人。

quiz.question: sophisticated ________
quiz.explanation: 复杂的，复杂的分析。The researcher provided a sophisticated analysis. 研究人员提供了复杂的分析。

quiz.question: dilapidated _____
quiz.explanation: 破旧的，破旧的房子。The dilapidated house needed extensive repairs. 破旧的房子需要大量维修。

quiz.question: unmitigated ________
quiz.explanation: 完全的，完全的灾难。The project was an unmitigated disaster. 该项目是完全的灾难。

quiz.question: striated ______
quiz.explanation: 有条纹的，有条纹的肌肉。Striated muscle tissue contracts voluntarily. 有条纹的肌肉组织自主收缩。

quiz.question: satiated ________
quiz.explanation: 满足的，满足的食欲。The large meal satiated appetite. 大餐满足的食欲。

quiz.question: ___ uninitiated
quiz.explanation: 外行的，外行人。The technical jargon confused the uninitiated. 专业术语让外行人感到困惑。

quiz.question: unsubstantiated _____
quiz.explanation: 未经证实的，未经证实的声明。The unsubstantiated claim was dismissed. 未经证实的声明被驳回。

quiz.question: belated _______
quiz.explanation: 迟来的，迟来的道歉。He offered a belated apology for his mistake. 他为自己的错误提供了迟来的道歉。

quiz.question: deflated ___
quiz.explanation: 受挫的，受挫的自我。His failure left him with a deflated ego. 他的失败让他有受挫的自我。

quiz.question: ____ discombobulated
quiz.explanation: 混乱的，感到混乱。The complicated instructions made him feel discombobulated. 复杂的说明让他感到混乱。

quiz.question: maculated ____
quiz.explanation: 有斑点的，有斑点的叶子。The disease caused maculated leaf. 疾病导致有斑点的叶子。

quiz.question: calculated ____
quiz.explanation: 精心策划的，精心策划的举动。It was a calculated move to gain advantage. 这是精心策划的举动以获得优势。

quiz.question: unregulated ______
quiz.explanation: 不受监管的，不受监管的市场。The unregulated market led to chaos. 不受监管的市场导致混乱。

quiz.question: animated ____
quiz.explanation: 动画的，动画电影。The children watched an animated film. 孩子们观看了动画电影。

quiz.question: _______ underestimated
quiz.explanation: 被低估的，被严重低估。The cost was grossly underestimated. 成本被严重低估。

quiz.question: opinionated ______
quiz.explanation: 固执己见的，固执己见的立场。He took an opinionated stance on the issue. 他对这个问题采取了固执己见的立场。

quiz.question: bloated ___________
quiz.explanation: 臃肿的，臃肿的官僚机构。The bloated bureaucracy needed reform. 臃肿的官僚机构需要改革。

quiz.question: celebrated ______
quiz.explanation: 著名的，著名的艺术家。The celebrated artist displayed her work. 著名的艺术家展示了她的作品。

quiz.question: serrated _____
quiz.explanation: 锯齿状的，锯齿状的刀。Use a serrated knife to cut the bread. 用锯齿状的刀切面包。

quiz.question: saturated ___
quiz.explanation: 饱和的，饱和脂肪。Saturated fat should be limited in diet. 饮食中应限制饱和脂肪。

quiz.question: sated ________
quiz.explanation: 满足的，满足的食欲。After the feast, everyone had a sated appetite. 盛宴后，每个人都有满足的食欲。

quiz.question: premeditated ______
quiz.explanation: 预谋的，预谋的谋杀。The crime was premeditated murder. 这起犯罪是预谋的谋杀。

quiz.question: unpremeditated ___
quiz.explanation: 非预谋的，非预谋的行为。It was an unpremeditated act of passion. 这是激情的非预谋的行为。

quiz.question: agitated _____
quiz.explanation: 激动的，激动的人群。The agitated crowd demanded answers. 激动的人群要求答案。

quiz.question: understated ________
quiz.explanation: 低调的，低调的优雅。The room had understated elegance. 房间有低调的优雅。

quiz.question: graduated ___
quiz.explanation: 累进的，累进税。The country has a graduated tax system. 该国有累进税制度。

quiz.question: superannuated _________
quiz.explanation: 过时的，过时的设备。The factory used superannuated equipment. 工厂使用过时的设备。

quiz.question: antiquated ______
quiz.explanation: 陈旧的，陈旧的系统。The antiquated system needed updating. 陈旧的系统需要更新。

quiz.question: infatuated ___
quiz.explanation: 迷恋的，迷恋的粉丝。The infatuated fan followed the celebrity everywhere. 迷恋的粉丝到处跟着这位名人。

quiz.question: cultivated _____
quiz.explanation: 有修养的，有修养的品味。He had cultivated taste in art. 他在艺术方面有有修养的品味。

quiz.question: ______ indebted
quiz.explanation: 负债的，深深负债。The company was deeply indebted. 公司深深负债。

quiz.question: distracted _______
quiz.explanation: 分心的，分心的驾驶。Distracted driving causes many accidents. 分心的驾驶导致许多事故。

quiz.question: dejected ____
quiz.explanation: 沮丧的，沮丧的表情。He had a dejected look after losing the game. 输掉比赛后，他有沮丧的表情。

quiz.question: ______ collected
quiz.explanation: 镇定的，保持镇定。Despite the chaos, she managed to remain collected. 尽管一片混乱，她还是设法保持镇定。
